channel.title: Rsc Scar
channel.description:
Don't like when people disrespect me, or disrespect the community... I wasn't going to release this.. But he was too pussy to respond to me on Mopar so I decided to post. Snoopy(iatex) is a fucking tool. Crooks(xpectz) is a cool person. He even knows snoopy is a retard. We've had a few talks on msn about his dumb ass.
[b]11:32:18 PM Me: Hey [/b] 11:33:25 PM Iatex - New updates coming today!!!: wat [b]11:33:30 PM me: Yo? [/b] 11:33:39 PM Iatex - New updates coming today!!!: go fuck youself
Kid says this to me. After all I've done for him. Recruited just about EVERY single person to his server, coded for him. Did nothing to 'harm' him at all. Snoopy is a tool. Doesn't know a single thing about coding. Kid didn't even know what to do when the XP on the server got boosted. He was all mad and didn't know how to fix it. He didn't know where the XP multiplier was. So I had to tell him. Learn to code before you make a server next time homo. [u]This post should NOT be deleted, or locked because this kid disrespects everyone in the community and I helped on this Source.[/u] Also. It's EASY RSC, with a few edits. So it should NOT be locked. Thanks in advanced. ~Thanks [link removed] -ghetto clan system(good start for noobs though) -a nice sub island that i did in like 15min.. -subscription bull shit -a bitch who gives starter items -few more things.. cbf to post -nothing that takes a lot of work. just something for people to learn from.

item.title: Rsc Scar
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Locked, not because I particularly care about your little love affair, nor because Snoopy wanted it to be, but because when you post something on Moparscape that makes me think “wow, that is really dumb” you know you have managed to overtake a lot of very strong competition.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc Scar
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Haha you didn’t do much whatever you did failed on so many ways only, And you never stuck to the rules. going on xpectz account was your choice mine was to ban you you deserved it. all you did was fucking up with the source you can’t do thing you don’t know about idiot. bring up my english ? lol got nothing to say? aww feel so sorry for you once again you fail. Your a fucking XML editor tool nothing else you can’t do java don’t even try. this source is far greater then everything you got.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc Scar
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

snoopy89:

[quote]Kid says this to me. After all I’ve done for him. Recruited just about EVERY single person to his server, coded for him. Did nothing to ‘harm’ him at all.

demodded because u went on xpectz and banned someone.
Oh yea release you gratest XML work you took from another server I had to clean up you ::town command which basically was taken from another source. and ou where to stupid to set a timer on it so people could teleport from pking and dueling and much more. you didn’t do shit expect a few xml edit, continue to be a fool you live up to it.[/quote]
I didn’t go on xpectz and ban anyone b4 u de-modded me. Don’t lie retard. I went on xpectz AFTER you de-modded me and banned stego, and was going to unban.
XML work I took? From where? and the town command could only be used by ADMINS and MODS. You fucking retard.
I did FAR more to the server than you did. And the funny thing is, I didn’t do too much.
It’s funny how you talk shit to Yong min, saying he’s a “Chink” and he can’t type… But you’re English is fucking HORRIBLE and you can barely construct a sentence.

Read full topic

Kid says this to me. After all I've done for him. Recruited just about EVERY single person to his server, coded for him. Did nothing to 'harm' him at all.

demodded because u went on xpectz and banned someone.
Oh yea release you gratest XML work you took from another server I had to clean up you ::town command which basically was taken from another source. and ou where to stupid to set a timer on it so people could teleport from pking and dueling and much more. you didn’t do shit expect a few xml edit, continue to be a fool you live up to it.

To release this just proves you unworthy little piece of shit and Im glad your kicked.

item.title: Rsc Scar
item.dc:creator: @Rick_kloos Rick kloos
item.description:
@Rick_kloos wrote:

I really don’t see why people have other people do it for them. Thats retarted. I’ve been at it for just over a week now starting from no computer knolledge at all and i’ve learned alot of the basic codings, aswell familiarized myself with the locations and uses for everything. If people want to make a server they should just take some time and learn it. Oh and get notepad ++ haha, Oldschoolrscplayer or w.e Linked me to that, it saved me so much trouble with closing strings =]

Read full topic
